name: Reverse-Feint
text: You can goad an opponent into attacking you in order to make your counter attack all the more powerful.
benefit: As a move action, you can leave a gap in your defenses for one adjacent opponent to use. If the opponent attacks you on its next turn, it gains a +4 bonus on its attack roll. Whether or not the opponent successfully hits, you may attack it as an immediate action with a single melee attack, gaining a +2 bonus on your attack roll.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points to make the attack granted by this feat as a free action rather than an immediate action. You can still make the attack only once per use of this feat.
text_zh: 你可以诱使一名敌人攻击你，从而进行一次更为强力的反击。
benefit_zh: 以一个移动动作，你可以使自己的防御对一名邻接的敌人露出破绽。若该敌人在它的下一轮中攻击你，他在攻击检定上获得+4加值。不论该敌人是否成功命中，你都能以一个直觉动作对其进行一个单次近战攻击，在你的攻击检定上获得+2加值。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗2点耐力来以一个自由动作而不是直觉动作做出这个专长赋予的攻击。每次使用这个专长时你仍只能做出该攻击一次。
